caption:
A fruity-fun flavor explosion you never saw coming🍊🍓🍋🍋‍🟩 Are you going to try it? We dare you!

Ingredients:
1 Bag Jet-Puffed Fruity-Fun Mini Marshmallows 
1 Jar Jet-Puffed Marshmallow Creme 
8oz Philadelphia Cream Cheese 
1 Tablespoon Vanilla Extract

How to Make It:
1. Mix Jet-Puffed Marshmallow Creme, softened Philadelphia cream cheese and vanilla in a bowl.
2. Fold in Jet-Puffed Fruity-Fun Mini Marshmallows with a spatula.
3. Refrigerate until ready to serve with your favorite crackers or fruit. Enjoy!
